title: Front End Developer
description:
Dear ,


We have urgent requirement of Frontend Developer with React JS at Dallas, TX Hybrid Location


If you are interested for this position or having suitable profile then, please share updated profile on amol1@osoventureinc.com or call on 680-435-2353


Title: Frontend Developer with React JS


Location: Dallas, TX Hybrid


Full Time


Primary: with good in React JS and Java Script


Skills


Strong proficiency in TypeScript, JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model


Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles


Experience with popular React.js workflows Redux and Flux


Experience with Node.js


Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript


Experience with design patterns, data structure libraries such as Container pattern, Redux-saga, React Hooks, and Immutable.js, etc.


Experience with JavaScript and CSS based templates and libraries such as bootstrap, semantic-UI, etc.


Experience with reactive JavaScript libraries RxJs


Strong knowledge of CSS and HTML5


Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and libraries such as; Jest, Enzyme, and Cypress


Knowledge of style props and utilities such as styled-components and styled-systems for rapid UI development


Knowledge of RESTful APIs


Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus.


Knowledge of mobile development with React Native is a huge plus.


Knowledge of GraphQL and AWS AppSync is a plus


Knowledge of modern authorization/authentication mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token, OAuth2, Okta


Familiarity with modern front-end development and build pipelines and tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.


Experience with cloud-native application development on AWS Cloud is a huge plus.


Familiarity with code versioning tool: Git


A knack for benchmarking and optimization


Looking forward to work with you


Thanks & Regards,


Amol Shingare


OSO Venture Inc.


Suite 200, Network, CA 94560


Phone : +1-680-435-2353


E-mail: amol1@osoventureinc.com
